title: Core blocks for Hecke algebras of type B and sign sequences
abstract: We consider the core blocks corresponding to the Hecke algebras of type B over a field of arbitrary characteristic. To each core block B, we associate two non-negative integers which determine the indexing of the Specht modules and simple modules in the block, the weight of the block, the multicharge of the algebra (up to a shift) and the block decomposition matrix.
